name: Nokia Ringtone
summary: Learn about .NRT files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Nokia cell phone users could use Nokia Sound Converter, an app included with the Nokia PC Suite, to convert standard MIDI files into NRT files. They could then transfer these files to their phones and use them as ringtones.

instructions: Provided you still have access to it, you can use Nokia Sound Converter (included in Nokia PC Suite) to open an NRT file, play the sound it contains, and transfer it to a Nokia cell phone. If you do not have access to Nokia Sound Converter, you likely will not be able to open your NRT file.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
